entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Professor Umbridge is a character in the story who is angry and wants to interrogate Harry. She is described as having a 'furiously quivering face'. (Excerpt: 'I wish to interrogate him!' shouted Umbridge angrily, and Snape looked away from Harry back into her furiously quivering face.)

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a character in the story who is smooth-talking and has no further stocks of Veritaserum. He looks away from Harry to Umbridge's face. (Excerpt: 'I wish you to provide me with a potion  that will force him to tell me the truth!' ... Snape looked back at Harry, who stared at him, frantic to communicate without words.)

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a character in the story who is trying to communicate with Snape without words. He thinks desperately about Voldemort having Sirius in the Department of Mysteries. (Excerpt: 'Voldemort’s got Sirius in the Department of Mysteries, he thought desperately.')

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is a character in the story who has Sirius in the Department of Mysteries. Harry thinks about this desperately. (Excerpt: 'Voldemort’s got Sirius in the Department of Mysteries, he thought desperately.')

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is a character in the story who is being held by Voldemort in the Department of Mysteries. Harry thinks about this desperately. (Excerpt: 'Voldemort’s got Sirius in the Department of Mysteries, he thought desperately.')

entities.name: veritaserum
entities.description: Veritaserum is a potion that Snape has no further stocks of. Umbridge wants him to provide her with it. (Excerpt: 'I wish you to provide me with a potion  that will force him to tell me the truth!' ... Snape said he had no further stocks of Veritaserum.)

relationships.description: Snape looks at Harry. (Excerpt: Snape looked back at Harry, who stared at him, frantic to communicate without words.)
Umbridge yells at Snape. (Excerpt: 'I wish to interrogate him!' shouted Umbridge angrily, and Snape looked away from Harry back into her furiously quivering face.)
Voldemort has Sirius in the Department of Mysteries. (Excerpt: 'Voldemort’s got Sirius in the Department of Mysteries, he thought desperately.')
